resources.string: Hi and welcome to the Heroclix tournament app beta. Just click start and your ready to write down everyone who are participating. Team points, name of tournament, rounds, and players are mandatory. Swiss is only option for now. You can also see old tournament, but only name and date (year month date). Please let me know if you find any bugs or have other inquires (Press menu and click report).
Do you really want to end the tournament?\nThis will take you to the leaderboard.
You forgot to set score on one or more players
Thank you for considering donating. Press \'okey\' to open your browser and be redirected to Paypal.com.
Thanks to my girlfriend for putting up with all the time I\'ve spent on this app, and thanks to Jason Herrick for helping me out!
